long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome Extension: Auto-Submit "Continue Watching" on YouTube

Tired of YouTube's "Video Paused. Continue Watching?" popup interrupting your long viewing sessions? Our Chrome extension automatically submits the "Continue Watching" prompt, ensuring uninterrupted playback. Whether you're binging a playlist, streaming music, or using YouTube for background noise, this extension keeps your videos running smoothly without any manual intervention. Say goodbye to annoying pauses and enjoy seamless viewing!

If you have any problems, don't hesitate to drop me an email @
